ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We thank Rumsaïs Blatrix (CNRS, UMR 5175—CEFE) and Bernard Kaufmann (CNRS, UMR 5023—LEHNA) for their invaluable help in the field, and Bianca Dupont, Zoé Simon and Eliabelle Mauduit for their major help to monitor the competitive interactions in the lab. We also thank Frederic Mery for the equipment loan, Muriel Deparis and Palmyre Pasteau for their help in colonies maintenance.
